answer:
The locator is currently being populated with clinic information for the 2019-20 influenza season, and more clinics will be added. In B.C., clinics will likely have the influenza (flu) vaccine by late October or early November. Some pharmacies and clinics may have it earlier. You can contact your local health unit or pharmacy to find out when the vaccine will be available in your area. You can also use our influenza (flu) clinic locator at a later date to find a clinic near you.
Immunization Nurse

question: I live in Golden BC. There are no Flu shot clinics listed for Golden, is it not happening this year?
question_variation_1: does golden flu shot clinic have flu shot clinics
question_variation_2: where is golden flu shot clinic?
